Class: List

List()

list accepts following props

Constructor

new List()

Properties:
Name Type Description
showHeader boolean to show header on the top of list like to show 'Post to timeline' or 'Create group'
headerSelected boolean to show tick if header row is selected
text string for showing header text like 'Post to timeline' or 'Create group'
imag image path with require like require('img.png') to show image on listheader inplace of thumbnail
onPressHeader callback on press of header row
data array of data which u wanna show in list either as groups or Friends
onPressRow callback on press of row other than header
extraData boolean in form of state variable to rerender flatlist for some specific condition other than change in data

  • components/contactPicker/List.js, line 33
